abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews theatrical monologue The Agony and the Ecstasy of Steve Jobs, written and performed by Mike Daisey at Public Theater.
snippet: Mike Daisey delves into the lives of the workers in China, and the grim conditions there, as he raises questions about our support of products made in such conditions.
lead_paragraph: Mike Daisey delves into the lives of the workers in China, and the grim conditions there, as he raises questions about our support of products made in such conditions.

headline.main: Moral Issues Behind iPhone and Its Makers
